org.primefaces.model

Class LazyDataModel<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.faces.model.DataModel<T>
      • org.primefaces.model.LazyDataModel<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<T>, org.primefaces.model.SelectableDataModel<T>

    public abstract class LazyDataModel<T>
extends javax.faces.model.DataModel<T>
implements org.primefaces.model.SelectableDataModel<T>, java.io.Serializable
    Custom lazy loading DataModel to deal with huge datasets
    See Also:
